title: How can I remove a device from the "Find My Device" app?
content:
My phone, a Pixel XL, was stolen recently and I have already used the "Find My Device" app to remotely secure the phone and erase everything off of the device.

I would like to remove the Pixel XL from the "Find My Device" app. I don't anticipate getting the phone back so I have no need for that device you be linked to the app any longer.
